dcterms:description: A hand gesture dataset collected using a Dynamic Vision Sensor (DVS) camera. It includes 1,342 instances of 11 hand gestures from 29 subjects under three lighting conditions. The dataset is designed for event-based gesture recognition and is available online.
dcterms:title: DvsGesture Dataset
